displaytitle: Inscriptions in graphite by Gertrude Hall Brownell and Ralph Martin
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
inscribed:
in ink, center: To Frank Jewett Mather | with kindest regards of | Gertrude Hall Brownell | who received this sketch book | from Ralph Martin | son of Homer Dodge Martin | May 25, 1942
in ink, on laid-in handwritten calling card verso: This, My Dear Mrs. Brownell | will, I believe, prove to be interesting and informative | to you. Anyhow I hope so | RM.

titles.title: Inscriptions in graphite by Gertrude Hall Brownell and Ralph Martin

texts.textentryhtml: Ralph Martin; Gertrude Hall Brownell (the artist's son); Gertrude Hall Brownell (Mrs. W.C. Brownell); Frank Jewett Mather, Jr.
